title: The Day after trinity
creator_contributor_role: KTEH-TV (Television station : San Jose, Calif.), production company
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Nuclear warfare
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Atomic bomb
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Oppenheimer, J. Robert (Julius Robert), 1904-1967
Mathematics, Science & Technology/Oppenheimer, J. Robert (Julius Robert), 1904-1967
description: A documentary on the life of J. Robert Oppenheimer, focusing on his role in the development of the atomic bomb and the dramatic events preceding the world's first atomic bomb explosion on July 16, 1945. A penetrating commentary on scientific inquiry, Oppenheimer's fall from grace during the McCarthy era, and the tragedy of continuing nuclear proliferation.
